# Changelog

<!-- ## [Unreleased] -->

## [1.0.1] - 2018-01-17
- Discard comments in the last processing step, allowing to use comments such as `/* autoprefixer: off */` ([#2](https://github.com/Shopify/postcss-shopify/pull/2))

## 1.0.0 - 2017-03-05
- Initial release
